TopicTitle: Game loading stuck on "Loading Part Upgrades"

Articles.Content: I have a modded install (https://imgur.com/4zvTJbv Mods) and loading seems to be stuck on "Loading Part Upgrades" and I've tried looking for the mods other people said caused the issue for them and I don't have any (KIS, KSPI, Surface Lights) so I'm not sure what's causing this. Im currently trying to check every single mod but that will take a while so any suggestions help
I solved it removing all copies of miniAVC.dll from the gamedata folder. I had five.
